page.title: 09Shopping Trends
page.content: A survey revealed that everybody shops at local shops.Most people shop at local shops for every day things but most people do their main shopping for the week at the larger stores.For the week nearly everybody went to Tesco.The second most popular shop was Sainsbury's.Co-op and Asda came next.All the main shops are in Lincoln except for Asda which is in North Hykeham. Most people go to the large stores in their own cars but a couple of people go on the free transport. Nocton has a combined post office and general store. Dunston has a general store it also has a post office which sells general goods.The third shop is a newsagents and general store.
